name: Rhythm Against the Machine
description:
Game developed for the 4th SantaMaria Game Jam. In this game you control two robots working to the rhythm of a music. It plays like guitar hero: you have to perform the correct actions at the right time.

The drummer has to play the drums using the Right and Left arrows.

The other robot has to use the press to destroy the robot head by holding Space, and releasing it at the right time.

You lose if you make too many mistakes. Paying attention to the music will help you win. Godd luck and have fun.
